Text: Thanks alot! If you could upload "Kung Fu Panda 2", I'd be extremely grateful! ^^
There's no sample, so I have to ask, is the text and writing within the movie English or Spanish?  All the others so far are Spanish and it's pissing me off!
I understand that, but I need to know if things like road signs and the bomb timer display on 'Mater are English.  So far, all I've seen is Spanish.

all the writing through the movie is in spansih.. it's a lot of .. well everything is in spanish.  it buggers up a half dozen scenes of the movie for those who haven't seen it before.. and kids who can't guess what it's supposed to say.

ptv83

Thanks for the backup.  It does effect the movie and all of these uploaders need to share this information!  I have wasted far too much time and bandwidth so far, when all they have to do is let us know.

@User897:

Wait for an english subtitle or make one for yourself !
